name: workspace-mcp
description: Full natural language control over Google Calendar, Drive, Gmail, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Forms, Tasks and Chat through all MCP clients, AI assistants and developer tools
long_description: A production-ready MCP server that integrates all major Google Workspace services with AI assistants. Built with FastMCP for optimal performance, featuring advanced authentication handling, service caching, and streamlined development patterns.

tools.name: google_calendar
tools.description: Manage Google Calendar through AI with full calendar and event capability

tools.name: google_drive
tools.description: Manage Google Drive through AI with full search, list and create capability

tools.name: gmail
tools.description: Manage Gmail through AI with support for search, draft, send, respond and more

tools.name: google_docs
tools.description: Manage Google Docs through AI with capability to search, extract, list, create and copy - including templated variable replacement support

tools.name: google_sheets
tools.description: Manage Google Sheets through AI with support for read, write, modify and create

tools.name: google_slides
tools.description: Manage Google Slides through AI with support for creation, modification and presentation management

tools.name: google_forms
tools.description: Manage Google Forms through AI with support for creation, retrieval, publishing, response management and more

tools.name: google_chat
tools.description: Manage Google Chat through AI with support for space and DM list, get, send and search messages

tools.name: google_tasks
tools.description: Manage Google Tasks through AI with support for task creation, management, and organization

GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.title: Google OAuth Client ID
GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: OAuth 2.0 client ID from Google Cloud Console (e.g., your-client-id.apps.googleusercontent.com)

GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.title: Google OAuth Client Secret
GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: OAuth 2.0 client secret from Google Cloud Console

GOOGLE_OAUTH_REDIRECT_URI.title: Google OAuth Redirect URI
GOOGLE_OAUTH_REDIRECT_URI.description: OAuth 2.0 redirect URI for authentication callback

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET_PATH.title: Google Client Secret File Path
GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET_PATH.description: Path to the client_secret.json file containing OAuth credentials

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRETS.title: Google Client Secrets (Legacy)
GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRETS.description: Legacy environment variable for client secret file path (use GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET_PATH instead)

WORKSPACE_MCP_BASE_URI.title: Workspace MCP Base URI
WORKSPACE_MCP_BASE_URI.description: Base URI for the MCP server, affects OAuth redirect URI and Gemini function calling

WORKSPACE_MCP_PORT.title: Workspace MCP Port
WORKSPACE_MCP_PORT.description: Port number for the MCP server to listen on

OAUTHLIB_INSECURE_TRANSPORT.title: OAuth Insecure Transport
OAUTHLIB_INSECURE_TRANSPORT.description: Allow OAuth over HTTP for development (enable for development only)
